attributes.action: Maintain the East Coast Mainline in Public Ownership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ECML should be run as a not-for-profit company; the franchise should not be re-let to a private company.  

Any profits should be directed to subsidising less profitable / loss-making rail routes to reduce the liability of the railways on the taxpayer.

When other franchises expire, they should also be operated by a not-for-profit company.
